documentation.text: @notice Address of Polygon's bridged message receiver

@notice Construct a new PolygonBridgeReceiver instance
 @param _fxChild Address of Polygon bridged message receiver*

@notice Update the fxChild address
 @param newFxChild New value for fxAddress

params._fxChild: Address of Polygon bridged message receiver*

params.proposalId: The id of the proposal to execute

params._govTimelock: Address of the governing contract that this contract will receive messages from (likely on another chain)
params._localTimelock: Address of the timelock contract that this contract will send messages to

params.data: ABI-encoded data of the bridged message
params.rootMessageSender: Mainnet address that initiated the bridged message
params.stateId: Value provided by fxChild when function is called; ignored

returns._0: The state of the given proposal (queued, expired or executed)

fxChild().notice: Address of Polygon's bridged message receiver

govTimelock().notice: Address of the governing contract that this bridge receiver expects to  receive messages from; likely an address from another chain (e.g. mainnet)

localTimelock().notice: Address of the timelock on this chain that the bridge receiver will send messages to

processMessageFromRoot(uint256,address,b.notice: Receive bridged message and enqueue in the Timelock

proposals(uint256).notice: Mapping of proposal ids to their full proposal data

state(uint256).notice: Get the state of a proposal
